Package DAO

Class AppointmentDB

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This Class creates a database CRUD for appointments.

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
        This method gets all Appointments from Observable List Appointments.
        Returns:
        Returns allAppointments observable Array list.

      • selectAllAppts

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> selectAllAppts()
        This method selects all Appointments. The method grabs all appointments from mySQL database and creates new appointment.
        Returns:
        Returns allappointment Array with new appointment.

      • nextID

        public static java.lang.Integer nextID()
        This method grabs next Appointment ID. This method will grab the next ID available in the database to use in adding an appointment.
        Returns:
        Returns appointment ID.

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String appTitle,
                                  java.lang.String appDescription,
                                  java.lang.String appLocation,
                                  java.lang.String appType,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime endTime,
                                  int customerID,
                                  int userID,
                                  int contactID)
        This method adds appointments to the DB. The method will add appointments to the mySQL database and add the appointment to the observable list.
        Parameters:
        appType - type of appointment
        appDescription - appointment description
        appLocation - appointment Location
        appTitle - appointment title
        contactID - Contact ID tied to the appointment
        customerID - Customer ID tied to the appointment
        endTime - Local time ending of appointment
        startTime - Local time of start of appointment
        userID - User ID tied to appointment

      • updateAppointment

        public static java.lang.Integer updateAppointment​(int appID,
                                                  java.lang.String appTitle,
                                                  java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                                                  java.time.LocalDateTime endTime,
                                                  java.lang.String date,
                                                  java.lang.String appType,
                                                  java.lang.String appDescription,
                                                  java.lang.String appLocation,
                                                  int contactID,
                                                  int customerID,
                                                  int userID)
        This method updates an appointment to the DB. Updates an appointment based off the appointment ID.
        Parameters:
        appID - integer for application ID
        appType - type of appointment
        appDescription - appointment description
        appLocation - appointment Location
        appTitle - appointment title
        contactID - Contact ID tied to the appointment
        customerID - Customer ID tied to the appointment
        endTime - Local time ending of appointment
        startTime - Local time of start of appointment
        userID - User ID tied to appointment
        date - local date tied to appointment
        Returns:
        Returns Application ID

      • deleteAppointment

        public static void deleteAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        This method deletes an appointment from the DB. The method deletes the appointment by grabbing the appointment ID from observable list.
        Parameters:
        appointment - is what gets removed by appointment ID
